ratings.comment: Adam is a fair essay grader with very clear grading criteria. I did topics in marine plastic pollution this semester, and his guidance helped a lot on my drafts. Just follow his step, and you will get it through.

I went to lectures every time but only received 6.5/10 for participation grade.

Very tough grader. Very strict to take his classes.

I'd recommend to drop if you happened to select his class. If there's no other options, try next semester if you do not need to graduate so earliy. Even for ESL 116 or 117. Lots of works to pass
tldr: he was convinced my first essay was "too good for you" and so I should "just tell him who wrote it on my behalf". May or may not have had anything to do with me being a shy foreign kid.

By far the best ESL teacher I've ever been with. His classes are genuinely fun. Adam can make you understand the material and solidify it through discussion, unlike other professors where they just read off of a textbook or PP slides. Would definitely take his classes again. No question about that.
Really good teacher, but nothing super super special I highly recommend him though.

He will be your nightmare if you take 118 from him. There is a huge problem about his teaching style. He does not know much and he does not teach much, but he expect you to reach high standard even he teach nothing. This is why learning from him is a pain since he is ridiculously picky and you can't even get help from him.

He really helped me get through 118. It is a hard class because of the UW requirements and Adam worked hard to make everything smooth. His office was always available and the conferences were great! On the final paper we worked together to pick a good topic and that helped me a lot.

I took ESL 118 several years ago, and  guess what? I just had a nightmare about him. He is the nightmare, and he will DESTROY your GPA. NO EXCEPTION! If you don't want to have a horrible dream about him in the future, and wake up at the midnight feeling depressed. I honestly suggest all the students avoid him, please!
Never ever take him, worse esl teacher I ever have. Avoid him, Avoid him, Avoid him. this is important so I mention three times

Do not take this class. He will destroy your GPA along with your morale. The toughest grader I have ever had hands down. His grading criteria is absolutely arbitrary and his teaching methods are archaic.

It is probably ok if you take esl 116 with him. However, if you take esl 118, never choose him. He just a ridiculous tough grader and never follows his promise and will completely destroy your GPA. Worse  teacher in the ESL department
It was a nice course to develop my English skill. I really appreciate it.
He was really kind to me this semester in 118 and had extra time in his office.  He really helped me write a good research paper.  It was a very good class!

Adam is really really helpful and always has extra office time for us.  I had a tough time with 118 Paper 2 but he really helped me figure out my topic and find articles.  By the way, he speaks Chinese so he can even explain it in my language!  But be careful, if you say something in class to your friend, he will understand. LOL!!
5 years ago I took 114 when I was a graduate student. Now I will get my PhD and Adam really helped me to get started.  He is very kind and always helpful. Thank you.
Knows how to write good papers.  After his class I got A's on papers in other classes.
Avoid him, or you will regret for the rest of your life.

Worst English teacher ever and ridiculously picky. You have to do it exactly want he say and follow every main point on the grading sheet to get a AB (I don't believe he gives A). He is bad because he don't care about students effort. He just so arrogant to approve student's new ways instead of his own. Don't take his class

He is so arrogant, he is always right. What is more, he would not take time to read your articles. Do not believe his words, things like he would reward efforts. He will never ever reward efforts, he just tries his best to be picky.
Listen to me, avoid him please, it is not joke.
Worst English teacher ever, avoid him.
He is the worst teacher I have ever had. He only focus on small things and will grade you as low as possible
Worst English teacher ever!! Don't take him. Teach nothing but set ridiculous high standard for students. Impossible to get an A

Worst Esl teacher ever. Don't take him. He will screw your grade as hard as possible. I worked so hard for my paper, spending an entire week on my draft, and he just ridiculously picky and gave grade as low as possible.
Avoid, no matter what. Very bad teacher.
Don't take him if you are a senior or for summer course, he is really a tough grader and ridiculously picky. impossible to get an A

I don't really want to offense someone, but he is a really bad teacher even if you work extremely hard, he just won't give you a good grade sorry but, don't take him, never, ever. unless you think your gpa is too high

DO NOT TAKE. He'll be all nice to you, but screw you up in the grading. Won't give what he promises. Even if theres no one left..

don't ever take his classes!!!! The worst class I've ever had!!! Super picky! Impossible to get an A no matter how hard you try!
Very Interesting
I think he's a nice guy and a good teacher. He was not that tough as in others' posts here. He gave some very high scores for my class, and I believe 4 people got A.

Great class! Adam is an interesting & extremely helpful professor!
AVOID

He is truly a tough grader.  Never take his class if you want an A. But I must say he has a sense of humor.  (though I don't think you can choose your instructor for English118 class)  This class really sucks.  I NEED AN A!
